info.description: Retrieves the activity details of an arrangement account
info.title: Retrieves the activity details of an arrangement account

get.summary: Retrieves the activity log of an account
get.description: Retrieves the activity log of an account

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

parameters.name: simulation
parameters.description: What if scenario reference

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Retrieves the transaction list for a given Account Number
get.description: Retrieves the transaction list for a given Account Number

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The date an agreement or contract ceases - the opposite of start date

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

get.summary: Retrieves the list of activities applicable for an arrangement account
get.description: Retrieves the list of activities applicable for an arrangement account

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: The unique identifiier of an arrangement contract. The format of the ID is YYDDDXXXXX prefixed with AA. YYDDD is the year and date of input in julian date format, XXXXX - is a random generated string.

parameters.name: activityId
parameters.description: The identifier of the activity

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

get.description: Retrieves the list of unauthorised activities of an account

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The identifier of the customer

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: The unique identifiier of an arrangement contract. The format of the ID is YYDDDXXXXX prefixed with AA. YYDDD is the year and date of input in julian date format, XXXXX - is a random generated string.

parameters.name: contractId
parameters.description: The identifier of the contract

parameters.name: transactionAmount
parameters.description: The transaction amount

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the application

parameters.name: inputter
parameters.description: This shows the user who entered the transaction

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

date.description: Indicates the date on which activity was performed

activity.description: Defines the activity to be processed against the Arrangement. The activity may be a user activity or a system generated activity.

type.description: The product condition has an activity type associated that drives an action.

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business
The identifier of error type: System

activityDate.description: Indicates the date on which activity was performed

activity.description: Defines the activity to be processed against the Arrangement. The activity may be a user activity or a system generated activity.

activityType.description: Indicates the type of an activity which was triggered by user or during a transaction.Eg:User,Txn.

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

activityStatus.description: Business Activity Status  POSSIBLE VALUES: 0: Ready  1: Running  2: Completed successfully  3: On hold or in error

activityDate.description: Indicates the date on which activity was performed

UserActivity.description: Indicates the activity which was triggered by User

activityStatus.description: Business Activity Status  POSSIBLE VALUES: 0: Ready  1: Running  2: Completed successfully  3: On hold or in error

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

bookingDate.description: The date on which the entry was generated. Normally, but not necessarily, the actual date at the time the entry is generated, e.g. if the previous day's business is still being processed after midnight, the actual date changes, but the run date is still the previous day.

propertyClassName.description: The name that is displayed for the property class

activityName.description: The name of the activity that is displayed

customerName.description: The name that is displayed for the customer

arrangementId.description: The unique identifiier of an arrangement contract. The format of the ID is YYDDDXXXXX prefixed with AA. YYDDD is the year and date of input in julian date format, XXXXX - is a random generated string.

inputter.description: This shows the user who entered the transaction
